title: Definition and use of referendum in UK and Russia

content.question:
The referendum is a feature of democratic politics. 

Define referendum and describe one advantage for a government of holding a referendum. 

Identify the official who has the power to call a referendum in Great Britain. Describe one example of the use or proposed use of one specific national referendum in Great Britain. 

Identify the official who has the power to call a referendum in Russia. Describe one example of the use or proposed use of one specific national referendum in Russia.
